body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons       Â      Hospital Corpsman looks at museum pieces in the Perry's Victory Visitor Center   The Perry's Victory Visitor Center and Memorial Column are open seasonally.  Visitor Center and Memorial Column Hours:      May 21 - Sept. 11  10 am - 6 pm Daily    Sept. 12 - Oct. 3  10 am - 5 pm Daily    Oct. 7 - Oct. 23  10 am - 5 pm Fri., Sat., Sun., & Mon.    Last ascent to the Observation Deck begins at 5:30 pm.
title: Perry's Victory & International Peace Memorial: Operating Hours & Seasons
